entities.name: skiving snackboxes
entities.description: Skiving Snackboxes are mentioned as something Fred and George had managed to sell before leaving Hogwarts. (Text: 'Meanwhile it became clear just how many Skiving Snackboxes Fred and George had managed to sell b efore leaving Hogwarts.')

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the people who sold Skiving Snackboxes. (Text: 'Fred and George had managed to sell...')

entities.name: george

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as someone who enters her classroom for students assembled there. (Text: 'Umbridge only had to enter her classroom for the student s assembled there to...')

relationships.description: Fred and George are mentioned as co-sellers of Skiving Snackboxes. (Text: 'Fred and George had managed to sell...')
Umbridge is mentioned as a teacher who enters her classroom for students assembled there. (Text: 'Umbridge only had to enter her classroom for the student s assembled there to...')
